description: Nigel Caldecott, who admitted breaking the Isle of Man's emergency laws, was sentenced to six weeks.
title: Coronavirus: Man jailed for selling items from home during self-isolation
title_page: Coronavirus: Man jailed for selling items from home during self-isolation - BBC News
maintext: He was reported to the authorities after he declined to shake the hand of a person visiting his home to pick up a picture frame, admitting that he was still within the mandatory self-isolation period.
